verbs.description: [ARG0: The official] [V: says] [ARG1: Michael Cohen , President Donald Trump 's personal lawyer and fixer , expects to be arrested " any day now . " Cohen is the focus of an investigation into whether he violated campaign - finance laws or committed bank fraud] .
